wikipedia_page.main: Stephen James "Steve" Batchelor (born 22 June 1961) is an English former field hockey player.

*22 June – Stephen Batchelor, English field hockey player and coach

Field Hockey player, and Olympic Gold Medalist, Stephen Batchelor was born in Beare Green on 22 June 1961. 1996 Grand National winner, Rough Quest was trained for the race by Terry Casey at Henfold House Stables, in a farm close to Beare Green in Capel.Henfold House Stables website. Retrieved on 30 May 2011.
